title: Ifẹ
summary: Ifẹ̀ (Yoruba: Ifẹ̀, also Ilé-Ifẹ̀) is an ancient Yoruba city in south-western Nigeria. The city is located in present-day Osun State.[2] Ife is about 218 kilometers northeast of Lagos[3] with a population of 509,813, the highest in Osun State according to population census of 2006.
